explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of reinforcement learning, a subset of machine learning, for portfolio management.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper explicitly mentions using reinforcement learning with two neural networks for developing the Portfolio Management System (PMS).
explanations.neural network: The paper utilizes neural networks (CNN and RNN) as part of the reinforcement learning approach.
explanations.deep learning: The use of neural networks (CNN and RNN) indicates the application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper specifically mentions using CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) as one of the neural networks in the PMS.
explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for Convolutional Neural Network, which is used in the PMS.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper specifically mentions using RNN (Recurrent Neural Network) as one of the neural networks in the PMS.
